home.description: A simple and efficient tool to manage the electoral vote counting process. Follow the steps to load voters, configure the counting, register ballots, and obtain results.

features.step1Description: Easily import the voter list from an Excel file
features.step2Description: Define delegates, scrutineers, and process parameters
features.step3Description: Register each ballot quickly and accurately

steps.step1Description: Import the voter list from an Excel file with the required fields
steps.step2Description: Define the number of delegates, scrutineers, and other necessary parameters
steps.step3Description: Register each ballot by selecting the corresponding votes
steps.step4Description: View final results and generate PDF reports

importantInfo.title: Important Information about Privacy and Security

storage.title: Local Storage
storage.description: All information is stored exclusively in your device's browser for a duration of 2 days.

privacy.title: Privacy Guaranteed
privacy.description: Data is never shared with external servers or databases. Your information remains completely private.

security.title: Security Responsibility
security.description: The security of your information depends on the security of your device. Ensure it remains protected.

deletion.title: Deletion Confirmation
deletion.description: Confirmation will always be requested before deleting any stored information.

items.backup: Download results in PDF as a backup once counting is complete.
items.browser: Do not close the browser or tab during the counting process.
items.power: Ensure your device has sufficient battery or is plugged into power.
items.device: Use a trusted and secure device to perform the scrutiny.
items.singleDevice: Perform the entire process on the same device and browser.
